item.description:
Hey Salsa Fans:

Join me for a fun evening dancing Salsa in the Park!

Lessons

There will be FREE lessons being offered at two different times taught by MetaMovements staff.

Lessons for all levels: 6pm
Additional lessons for Beginners: 7:15pm
Join us for the party until 9pm!

Music

We have the fantastic DJ Hernan to entertain you with all the great music you love.

A great mix of classic and new salsa - all the hits you crave to dance to.

For More info Visit

http://www.metamovements.com/sitp/

Video preview

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dFa53bsQhCY

 

See you there!

-Angel
item.how_to_find_us: I will be wearing a Black Fedora Hat !!

group.name: The Boston & Cambridge Salsa Meetup Group

item.name: Come dance at Salsa in the Park!
